rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming area that adheres to Vastu by ensuring the entrance is in a favorable direction.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open concept living space with large windows for natural light and cross ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen area, designed with natural ventilation in mind.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact yet efficient layout ensuring easy movement and natural light entry.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private space with large windows to allow natural light; aligning east-west as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy and well-ventilated bedroom designed for guest use.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring comfort and proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Library/Study Room
rooms.description: Spacious area dedicated to reading and study with abundant natural light; built as per Vastu for creativity and focus.

rooms.name: Mezzanine Lounge
rooms.description: Elevated open space for relaxation with natural lighting and ventilation; designed to blend Mediterranean aesthetics with Indian building norms.
